abstract: Olympic gold medalist Yuzuru Hanyu takes commanding lead at world figure skating championships in Boston after skating flawless short program; other figure skating news noted.
snippet: The Olympic gold medalist Yuzuru Hanyu skated a flawless program to take a large lead after the short program at the world championships in Boston.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic gold medalist Yuzuru Hanyu skated a flawless program to take a large lead after the short program at the world championships in Boston.
